articles.author: Eileen Reslen
articles.title: Wendy Williams' ex-rep questions if host's dementia, aphasia diagnoses are 'true' after health 'deteriorated' under guardianship - Page Six
articles.description: “How did her health deteriorate so quickly, and why isn’t her only child allowed to be by her side [?],” the entertainment law attorney asked via Instagram Saturday.
articles.content: Wendy Williams’ former financial adviser, attorney LaShawn Thomas, is concerned about her ex-client, alleging the famed talk show host’s health has severely declined since she was placed in a guardia… [+4270 chars]
